title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Simulation-Based Learning for Non-Technical Skills (NTS) Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic leadership theories and work management experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve team communication skills in crisis situations by 80% or more after simulation training.
Learners achieve a score of 3 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in the collaboration category of the NTS assessment tool (AS-NTS standards) upon completion of the 4-week course.
Learners maintain intrinsic motivation improved by 15% or more in post-session motivation scale (SIMS) measurements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
